actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to waive the 24-month waiting period for Medicare coverage of individuals disabled by reason of exposure to tremolite asbestos.
short_title: Timely Access to Care Act of 2006
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Timely Access to Care Act of 2006 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) to waive the 24-month waiting period for Medicare coverage of individuals disabled by reason of exposure to tremolite asbestos.

titles.title: Timely Access to Care Act of 2006
A bill to amend the Social Security Act to waive the 24-month waiting period for Medicare coverage of individuals disabled by reason of exposure to tremolite asbestos.
